Articles.Content:
Hiho,

It is going to be my first interplanetary landing here (really low gravity and atmosphere makes the final approach very long) on Eve so it'll be very memorable planet for me

Share your pics of this beauty

I don't think that I can actually return our beloved Jeb to his mother Planet since I've got just a half of a fuel tank, however I will try to make a nice circ orbit

The thing I know is that my final stage doesn't fit here

Nice! I havent actually landed on eve with something bigger than capsule + chutes, the gravity is just too strong.. Thus I dont think you will make it to orbit with this, as take off from Eve to orbit is actually more ÃŽâ€v expensive than taking off from Kerbin
